name: Plant Research and Biotechnology: Addressing Global Problems
description: Plant scientists working to address pressing global challenges will give presentations.  In advance students will identify terminologies and methodologies needed to engage with the speaker and think critically about the research. Student teams will identify and develop background knowledge and go beyond speaker’s presentations with new questions and/or applications.
prerequisites: BIOB38H3 & [one of BIOC15H3, BIOC31H3, BIOC37H3 or BIOC40H3]
